title: New York City Shootings of Police Prompt Mayor Eric Adams to Focus on Anti-Crime Policies
sub_head: Five NYPD officers have been shot so far in 2022, and crime is up 40% from the same period a year ago
body:
New York City Mayor Eric Adams proposed new policing initiatives and asked state lawmakers to change bail laws Monday after a series of high-profile shootings have dominated his early weeks in office.
Five police officers have been shot since the start of the year, including a rookie officer who was killed Friday while responding to a domestic disturbance call in Harlem. Another officer who responded to that incident was shot and remains hospitalized, police said.
